name: Vacation Paradise: Florida Collector's Edition
description:
Take a Vacation with us to the sunshine state of USA! From the beautiful beaches to the diverse variety of exciting activities. Florida’s large range of lakes has led to it being the home for the fishing capital of the world!…The breathtaking Clearwater Beach, the classic Coral Castles and historical Rail Museum. Play 10 minigames as you go along. Make sure to collect all the Florida Seals and US Flags to unlock an Unlimited Mode and bonus minigames. Start your Florida Vacation!

• 14 bonus scene locations!
• 19 Gold Medal achievements!
• Exclusive 10 bonus game!
• 5 Modes – Word, Silhouette, Scrambled Word, Missing Vowels, Finding Pairs
